title: 14 Feb 2020 Japan's Q4 GDP Likely Plunged, Covid-19 Spells Recession
text:
Asia | 14 Feb 2020 Japan's Q4 GDP Likely Plunged, Covid-19 Spells Recession

Japan's GDP likely dropped by a huge 0.9% quarter-on-quarter in Q4, after the 0.5% increase in Q3, with risks skewed firmly to the downside.



Sorry, but our website is best viewed on a device with a screen width greater than 320px. You can contact us at: info@pantheonmacro.com.
